**Solution**

Define 
\[
\SE_{\mathrm{pred}} = s \sqrt{\vect{x^*}^T (\mat{X}^T\mat{X})^{-1}\vect{x^*}+1},
\]
where $s$ is the residual standard error.
$\SE_{pred}$ is an estimate of $\sd\big(\vect{Y^*} - \vect{x^*\beta}\big)$.
Thus the prediction interval is
\[
\hat{y}^* \pm 1.96\, \SE_{\mathrm{pred}}.
\]
